Description:
Tradesman Delight! The Ultimate family Home with 3 Living Areas!
Vendor Says Must Be Sold!
Priced to sell... SO much for so Little!
Double Carport plus high single carport for boat or Caravan. Plus a large garage at the back!
This home it truly "The Entertainers Delight!"
For the very first time since this home has been built, this magnificent property is finally up for sale and waiting for you to call home!
As soon as I approached the home, I couldn't help but notice the abundance of space utilised on this property to allow for the extra vehicles which is very rare to find in a property today.
This four bedroom, 3 living area, family home has everything to offer for those in need of lots of space both inside and out.
When location is a must, then you can add this to your tick of boxes. Features include: Master bedroom includes: ceiling fan, ensuite & WIR. The formal lounge & dining leads into the stunning blackwood timber kitchen with double fridge space, dishwasher and plenty of bench & cupboard space.
This unique open plan living creates so many choices of living areas, which is such a flexible combination, depending on the size and needs of your family.
From the kitchen, the meals area is massive enough for 10 seat dining. The second living area is a great space for the kids to play and is the central hub of the home complimented by a warm and inviting wood heater for the winter months and air conditioning for hot summer days.
If that is not enough living space then this is sure to please, with a fantastic rumpus/theatre room at the rear of the home that also has a separate air conditioner and lots of storage space.
Other features include: stunning polished floor boards, ducted floor heating through out, solar panels (10) outside awnings, main bathroom with corner spa, and the other 3 bedrooms are very generous in size compared to today's standards.
Head outside and this is where the boys are sure to jump for joy.. Features include double carport, plus an enclosed carport behind gates to accommodate a large caravan, boat or vehicle. Plus at the rear of the home on the same side is a large single garage/workshop for anyone who likes to tinker or craft in their own trade.
There is also extra space on the left hand side of the property for extra space for more vehicle accommodation, 2 x 10 x 10 sheds, wood shed, and timber decked entertainment area.
Close to many facilities, including the Cranbourne home maker centre, schools, shops and train station, this is a must for those who like everything at their finger tips.
The list of these features to this once of a life time opportunity to find a home this has to offer is sure to be snapped up very fast, and inspection will show an appreciation and dedication to creating a family home for the whole family!
Be Quick as a home like this WILL SELL FAST!
